item.title: Boat Airdopes 171
item.dc:creator: Good Student
item.description: Plug into the music of your choice with Best Bluetooth earbuds boAt Airdopes 171 to enjoy your playlist in a truly wireless way. With its 380mAh carry cum charging case it offers a playtime of up to 10 Hours and a battery capacity of 43mAh for each earbud, indulge in a blissful audio experience for up to 3 Hours in a go. It has the IPX4 rated shield to offers resistance against water and dust scares. The True Wireless Earbuds (TWS) Airdopes 171 come equipped with 6mm drivers for immersive sound. The stereo calling feature lets the user indulge in smooth and clear chats over calls. Its latest Bluetooth v5.0 offers seamless instant connectivity. One can access the instant voice assistant by just a single press via the Multifunction Button control
